titles.title: Mohegan Nation of Connecticut Land Claims Settlement Act of 1994
Mohegan Nation of Connecticut Land Claims Settlement Act of 1994
Mohegan Nation of Connecticut Land Claims Settlement Act of 1994
To settle Indian land claims within the State of Connecticut, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1334-1335)
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Late Referral to the Subcommittee on Native American Affairs (Aug 30, 94).
Hearings Held by the Subcommittee on Native American Affairs Prior to Referral.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held and Forwarded to Full Committee by the Subcommittee on Native American Affairs Prior to Referral (Amended) by Voice Vote.
Favorable Executive Comment Received from Interior.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 103-676.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 367.

action.text: Mr. Richardson moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate.

calendar.text: Read twice. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 553.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
Senate struck all after the Enacting Clause and substituted the language of S. 2329.

vote.text: Passed Senate in lieu of S. 2329 with an amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Mr. Gejdenson moved that the House suspend the rules and agree to the Senate amendment.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

At the conclusion of debate, the chair put the question on the motion to suspend the rules. Mr. Walker objected to the vote on the grounds that a quorum was not present. Further proceedings on the motion were postponed until Oct. 5. The point of no quorum was withdrawn.
House considered Senate amendment under suspension of the rules.

vote.text: On motion that the House suspend the rules and agree to the Senate amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/3/1994--Passed Senate amended. Mohegan Nation of Connecticut Land Claims Settlement Act of 1994 - Provides for the settlement of land claims between the Mohegan Tribe and the State of Connecticut and its subdivisions. Ratifies the Agreement between the Tribe and the Town of Montville. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to take and hold certain lands in trust for the Mohegan Tribe as its initial reservation upon satisfaction of certain environmental requirements. Extends Connecticut criminal jurisdiction over the Mohegan Reservation.
